detail_desc: Short-sleeved jersey top in a viscose blend with print motifs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs.
Mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with chunky soles. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.

Shorter padded jacket in imitation patent leather. Padded hood with a tab and press-studs at the front and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Double-layer hat in a soft rib knit.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knee-length kaftan dress in softly draping jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck front and back, a gathered seam below the bust and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with a pointed collar, V-neck opening at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long balloon sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Dungaree shorts in cotton twill with decorative buttons at the top, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and press-studs at the sides. Side and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Loose-fitting top in an airy, patterned weave with fringing. Short, wide raglan sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, striped organic cotton jersey with buttons at the top and a chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves and hems.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Skirt in a viscose weave with a smocked waist and tiers with overlocked edges. Unlined.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and bell-shaped skirt.
Fitted Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline, button placket, long sleeves and rounded hem.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder in sizes 0-12M.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders, gently tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Regular waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Lace dress with a boat neck, cap sleeves, zip at the back and seam at the waist with a velvet trim and decorative bow. Jersey lining.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight blouse in airy woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar and covered buttons down the front. Frilled yoke, long balloon sleeves with a seam and wide cuffs with a covered button, and slits in the sides.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Satin hairband with a decorative tie detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with peak lapels, flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The coat is made partly from recycled wool.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective print motifs and palms in anti-slip fabric for extra grip. Long shafts with elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and elastication at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Fleece lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped, sleeveless top in smocked cotton jersey with narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps and overlocked edges at the top and bottom.
Jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs with flared hems. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y).

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back. Lined.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringed trims.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned slub jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a tab and button on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Derby shoes with decorative welt seams and open lacing at the front. Rubber soles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut, double-breasted dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and notch lapels. Long sleeves, a seam at the hips and a pleated skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in fluted, crinkled fabric with a low waist and high cut at the back.

Bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front with a decorative bow, and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Fitted, polo-neck jersey top with long sleeves.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Dress in a patterned weave with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, decorative gathers at the front, an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, wide raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee-length jacket in a sturdy, patterned weave with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves, discreet pockets in the side seams and tape-trimmed inner seams. No fasteners. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Tuxedo trousers in a wool weave with satin stripes down the sides of the legs. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Length 5 cm.

Set containing eight ear cuffs and four different hoop earrings in metal. Five of the pieces are decorated with sparkly glass beads and two with shimmering plastic pearls. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a narrow stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
T-shirt in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Shorter, fitted jumper in a rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Long, fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Embossed metal buttons at the front and cuffs. Lined.
Patterned kimono in satin crêpe with dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves and long slits in the sides. No fasteners.
Dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Calf-length at the back and shorter at the front. Unlined.
Satin top with a draped neckline and narrow, detachable shoulder straps in metal with sparkly stones. Double layer at the top.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with appliqués on the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Off-the-shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Halterneck body with a woven top, seam at the hips and jersey lower section. Press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in woven fabric. V-neck top in a double layer with narrow, double shoulder straps. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Mid waist with wide elastication, overlocked edges around the legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille with elasticated tops.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
